name: Vermin Attack
description:
It's harvest time and the farm is under attack by vermin. You must take up your trusty clubs and protect your crops.

Created for the Ludum Dare 52. Vote here.

Influenced by Game and Watch - Vermin.

HOW TO PLAY

Use the <- and -> arrow keys for movement. The farmer will whack the vermin automatically. The harvest will be protected once you whack 100 vermin.

Difficulty gradually increases and is toned down for the jam. Everyone should be able to finish the game within a couple of tries.

CREDITS

Artwork - Kenney

Music - Andrea Baroni
